text: <Willem> cyng grete ealle mine biscopas & mine eorlas & mine <gerefan> & ealle mine ðegenan frecisce & ænglisce on ðam <ran> ðe Lanfranc arcebiscop & se hyred æt cristus cyrcean <n> cantwara byrig habbað land inne freondlice.

Ic kyðe <eow> þæt ic hæbbe hem geunnen þæt he beon ælc ðara landa wurðe <e> hi hæfdon on eadweardes kynges dæge mines mæges & <aca> & socne on strande & on streame on wudan & on feldan tolles & teames griðbrices & ham socne & for <tealles>.

& infangen ðeofes & flymena friðinga ofer <eora> agena men binnon burgon & buton swa ful, & <wa> forð swa mine agene wicneras, hit secean sceoldon eallon ðingon me sylfan to hande & ofer swa fela <gena> swa ic heom to to gelætan habbe.

& ic nelle <geðaf> naðor ne frænciscan ne ængliscan þæt ænig ðinge onteo buton hi sylfe & heora wicneras ðe hi hi betæ <n> willað forðam ðingan ðe ic hæbbe criste ðas gerihta <gyfan> mynre sawle to ecere alysendnisse eallra <weard> kyning myn mæg ær hæfde.
& ic nelle ðurh <ðingc> þæt ænig mann ðis abreke be minan fullan <freondscype>; god eow gehealde.
